**Example Usage**

```{r}
library(diffrprojects)

dp <- diffrproject$new()

testfiles <- rtext:::testfile(pattern="rc_\\d.txt", full.names = TRUE)

dp$text_add(testfiles)
names(dp$texts)
dp$text_data()

dp$texts_link()
dp$links
```
